translation: Dhāraṇī of the Sacred Planet Mothers, Spoken by the Buddha

source_sentence: 西天譯經三藏朝散大夫試鴻臚卿
translation: Tripiṭaka of the Western Translation of the Scriptures, Tathāgata, Minister of the Chaoshan dynasty

source_sentence: 傳教大師臣法天奉　詔譯
translation: Translated by imperial order of the Minister Fetian, the Master of the Transmission of the Teachings
Thus I've heard.

source_sentence: 一時佛在阿拏迦嚩帝大城。
translation: One time, the Buddha was in the great city of Alakavatī.

source_sentence: 爾時有無數天龍夜叉乾闥婆阿修羅迦樓羅緊那羅摩睺羅伽人非人。
translation: At the time, there were countless gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, humans, and nonhumans.

source_sentence: 及木星火星金星水星土星。
translation: They were Jupiter, Mars, Venus, Mercury, and Saturn.
Taiyan Sun Rāhu Ketu.

source_sentence: 如是等二十七曜恭敬圍遶。
translation: These twenty-seven celestial bodies surround them with respect.

source_sentence: 此大金剛三昧莊嚴道場。
translation: This is the site of the great adamantine samādhi adorning the Way.

source_sentence: 復有無數千菩薩摩訶薩眾。
translation: Again, there are countless thousands of bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and crowds of bodhisattvas.

source_sentence: 其名曰金剛手菩薩金剛忿怒菩薩。
translation: They're called the Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva, the Vajra-raging Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 金剛軍菩薩金剛播尼菩薩。
translation: Vajra Army Bodhisattva, Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 金剛主菩薩金剛莊嚴菩薩。
translation: Vajrarāja Adorned Bodhisattva, the Vajrāja Lord Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 金剛明菩薩金剛敷菩薩。
translation: Vajrasphoṭa Bodhisattva, Vajrasphoṭa Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 觀自在菩薩普觀世菩薩。
translation: Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, the Universal Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva.
Auspicious Bodhisattva Lianhuabang Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 蓮華藏菩薩蓮華目菩薩。
translation: Lianhuazang Bodhisattva Lianhuamu Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 慈氏菩薩文殊師利法王子菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: Maitreya Bodhisattva, Mañjuśrī, Prince of the Dharma, Bodhisattva Mahāsattva.

source_sentence: 如是等諸大菩薩恭敬圍遶。
translation: Such and such great bodhisattvas surrounded them with respect.

source_sentence: 佛為說法初善中善後善。
translation: The Buddha taught the Dharma, teaching the first good, middle good, and last good.
His meaning was profound and his words were clever.

source_sentence: 純一無雜具足清白莊嚴如意。
translation: They were pure, uniform, unadulterated, and complete, pure, and adorned as intended.

source_sentence: 爾時金剛手菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: It was then that the Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva Mahāsattva rose from his seat and used his supernormal powers to teach the Dharma.
He rose from his seat and used his supernormal powers to circumambulate the Bhagavān to his right.
He circled the Bhagavān on his right side in an incalculable number of hundreds of thousands of turns.
He bowed with his head in front of him and sat cross-legged.
With his pure eyes, he observed the large crowd.
He formed his vajra with his palms together and placed it between his heart and mind.
He said to the Bhagavān.
"There are constellations and celestial beings with crude appearances.
Their minds are full of anger and they harm sentient beings.
They may cut off their life roots, deplete people of their wealth, or increase their years of life.

source_sentence: 或減人精神或促人年壽。
translation: They may diminish a person's spirit or prolong their life span.
This harms and distresses all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 惟願世尊說正密法為作擁護。
translation: May the Bhagavān explain the right esoteric teaching and defend it.
The Buddha said, "Good, good!

source_sentence: 汝能慈愍利益一切眾生。
translation: You can compassionately benefit all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 問於如來最上祕密之法。
translation: You're asking about the Tathāgata's most esoteric teaching.
Now, listen closely and well consider it.
I'll explain the Vajrapāṇi for you.
Thus are all the bad constellations and celestial beings.

source_sentence: 及天龍夜叉乾闥婆阿脩羅迦樓羅緊那羅摩睺羅伽人非人等。
translation: gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, assuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, humans, and nonhumans.
You should use the most excellent patron scriptures.
Make offerings to each of them according to the rules of worship and music.
Make offerings to each one of them with the support of the Dharma.
Make them rejoice and cease all evil.
It was then that Śākyamuni Buddha.
A great radiance emanated from within his own mind.
It was called the light of compassion.
It entered the tops of the constellations and celestial bodies.

source_sentence: 剎那之間一切宿曜及日月等。
translation: In a moment, all the constellations, suns, moons, and so forth.
He then rose from his seat and bowed his head and face at his feet.

source_sentence: 右膝著地合掌恭敬白佛言。
translation: He put his right knee on the ground, joined his palms in respect, and said to the Buddha.
"Bhagavān, the Tathāgata is Worthy of Correct Enlightenment.
May you grant us permission to gather in and explain the right teaching.

source_sentence: 我等若聞擁護有情令無災害。
translation: If we hear about it, we'll protect sentient beings so they won't be harmed.

source_sentence: 所有禁縛刀劍毒蟲一切不害。
translation: All the things that are bound, knives, swords, and poisonous insects won't harm them.
I'll form an earthbound boundary and guard it.
It was then that the Śākyamuni Tathāgata came forth.
He then spoke the true words of the offering to Suyāma.

source_sentence: 唵銘(引)齲(引)攞迦(二合引)野娑嚩(二合引)賀(引)唵(引)尸(引)旦(引)舍尾(引)娑嚩(二合引)賀(引)唵(引)洛訖旦(二合引)誐俱麼(引)囉野娑嚩(二合引)賀(引)唵(引)冐(引)馱野冐(引)馱野娑嚩(二合引)賀(引)唵(引)步(引)誐(引)娑波(二合)那野娑嚩(二合引)賀(引)唵(引)阿穌囉薩多麼(引)野娑嚩(二合引)賀(引)唵(引)訖里(二合)瑟拏(二合)嚩囉拏(二合引)野娑嚩(二合引)賀(引)唵(引)阿沒里(二合)多鉢里(二合)夜野娑嚩(二合引)賀(引)唵(引)乳(引)底計(引)多吠(引)娑嚩(二合引)賀(引)爾時世尊說真言已。
translation: 唵銘(引)齲(引)攞迦(二合引)野娑嚩(二合引)賀(引)唵(引)尸(引)旦(引)舍尾(引)娑嚩(二合引)賀(引)唵(引)洛訖旦(二合引)誐俱麼(引)囉野娑嚩(二合引)賀(引)唵(引)冐(引)馱野冐(引)馱野娑嚩(二合引)賀(引)唵(引)步(引)誐(引)娑波(二合)那野娑嚩(二合引)賀(引)唵(引)阿穌囉薩多麼(引)野娑嚩(二合引)賀(引)唵(引)訖里(二合)瑟拏(二合)嚩囉拏(二合引)野娑嚩(二合引)賀(引)唵(引)阿沒里(二合)多鉢里(二合)夜野娑嚩(二合引)賀(引)唵(引)乳(引)底計(引)多吠(引)娑嚩(二合引)賀(引)爾時世尊說真言已。
He told the Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva.
"Thus, these are the nine luminous words of the true teaching.
Everyone who recites them will attain success.
First, you must apply perfume according to the Dharma.
Rub it on the width of the maṇḍala's twelve fingers.

source_sentence: 或金銀器或銅器瓦器等。
translation: It could be a gold or silver vessel, a bronze vessel, a tile vessel, or so forth.
Offer up an offering to the stars and celestials.

source_sentence: 用前真言各念一百八遍。
translation: Use the preceding true words to recite them each one hundred and eight times.
The thing that he seeks will be accomplished.
The Buddha told Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 我今復說陀羅尼名聖曜母。
translation: "Now, I'll again explain that the dhāraṇī is called 'Mother of Sacred Luminaries.'
It has the power of great insight to guard it.
All the constellations and celestial beings who hear it rejoice.

source_sentence: 若有苾芻苾芻尼優婆塞優婆夷。
translation: If there are any monks, nuns, laymen, or laywomen who hear this sūtra, they'll present it to the maṇḍala.

source_sentence: 聞此經典於曼拏羅獻閼伽供養。
translation: Hearing this sūtra, they make offerings to the mannalāla and make offerings to Guhya.
He recites this true saying seven times.
He'll then attain wealth and long life.

source_sentence: 若日日持誦彼一切宿曜。
translation: If he recites it every day, he'll recite it all the years before.
It'll fulfill all the wishes of sentient beings.
The dhāraṇī for the mother of all constellations says.

He told the Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva, "Now, this is the most esoteric and esoteric of true sayings.
"This true teaching is the most excellent and esoteric.
It can grant sentient beings the fulfillment of all their vows.
Suppose someone seeks a long life and so forth.
He should begin on the seventh day of the eighth month.
He observes the precepts until the 14th day and night.

source_sentence: 依法供養宿曜至十五日。
translation: He makes offerings to the constellations and luminaries in accordance with the Dharma until the fifteenth day.

source_sentence: 一晝夜中讀誦此陀羅尼。
translation: During the day and night, he recites this dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 彼人得長壽至九十九歲。
translation: That person will attain a long life span of 99 years.

source_sentence: 所有雷電龍鬼諸惡星曜皆不能怖。
translation: All thunderbolts, lightning, dragons, and ghosts, as well as bad stars and celestials, are unafraid.
He'll also attain knowledge of past lives and have his wishes fulfilled.

source_sentence: 爾時一切宿曜聞佛所說。
translation: At the time, all the constellations and celestials heard what the Buddha taught.

source_sentence: 讚言善哉善哉甚為希有。
translation: They praised him, saying, "Good, good! That's rare!
We'll accept and uphold it.

source_sentence: 即以頭面禮世尊足忽然不現。
translation: They then bowed their heads to the Bhagavān's feet and suddenly disappeared.
Dhāraṇī of the Sacred Planet Mothers Spoken by the Buddha
